name: IMAGO
description:
WASD - movement

Arrow Keys - move mirror

R - restart

This game was made in two days for the 1-bit Weekend jam. No external assets were used (other than a few tutorials), so it was made from scratch. By one dude. Me. Zachary McKenzie. I'm a pretty awesome. I'm 14 years old. Just btw. Here's my YouTube channel.

My YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoJpuiT-oCoAEa6XFm3RjSg?view_as=subscriber

Please leave a comment if you read all the way to the end of this description, you're a legend.
